content:
System.Web.DynamicData.Design Namespace

Definition

The System.Web.DynamicData.Design namespace contains classes that provide design-time support for the classes in the System.Web.DynamicData namespace.

In this Article

Classes

DataControlReferenceCollectionEditor

Provides a component editor for the data controls collection of the DynamicDataManager control.
DataControlReferenceIDConverter

Creates a user-selectable collection of data controls.
DynamicDataManagerDesigner

Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the DynamicDataManager control.
DynamicFieldDesigner

Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the DynamicField object.
